gist.summary: Updated the Google Summer of Code dashboard with new mentor assignments and defined project capacity limits.
gist.impact: Ensures a smoother coordination process for students and mentors in the open-source program.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee organizing a pixelated bulletin board with project notes. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'GSOC'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
